org.apache.commons.math4.ode.nonstiff

Class MidpointIntegrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.math4.ode.AbstractIntegrator
      • org.apache.commons.math4.ode.nonstiff.RungeKuttaIntegrator
        • org.apache.commons.math4.ode.nonstiff.MidpointIntegrator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FirstOrderIntegrator, ODEIntegrator

    public class MidpointIntegrator
extends RungeKuttaIntegrator
    This class implements a second order Runge-Kutta integrator for Ordinary Differential Equations.

    This method is an explicit Runge-Kutta method, its Butcher-array is the following one : 

        0  |  0    0
   1/2 | 1/2   0
       |----------
       |  0    1

    Since:
    1.2
    See Also:
    EulerIntegrator, ClassicalRungeKuttaIntegrator, GillIntegrator, ThreeEighthesIntegrator, LutherIntegrator
